summary: An Ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2392 for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 24852, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof, shown on said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
